channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 2025-26 NBA Title Odds: OKC Favored; Spurs Spike While Lakers Fall
item.description: There is movement across the Western Conference, with a new title contender and a fading one. See the latest title odds.

item.title: Could Seattle Sounders and Mexico midfielder Obed Vargas Move to Europe?
item.description: Obed Vargas has already built an impressive résumé in Seattle, where he has made 130 appearances.

item.title: NASCAR Paint Schemes: New & Refreshed Looks for 2026

item.title: Sources: Mendoza's brother to transfer from IU
item.description: Indiana backup quarterback Alberto Mendoza entered the NCAA transfer portal Tuesday, sources told ESPN.

item.title: NCAA golf champ joins LIV, forfeits Masters spot
item.description: Reigning NCAA men's golf champion Michael La Sasso has joined LIV Golf, forfeiting his chance to play in this year's Masters.
